channel.title: Movies & TV on Geekosaur
channel.description: Recent content in Movies & TV on Geekosaur

item.title: Paranormal: Supernatural Mystery From Egypt
item.description: As I mentioned in the last post, this year I’ve watched some great foreign language movies and TV shows. For this series of posts I’m going to start with the most recent that I finished: Paranormal.

item.title: Which Foreign Language Shows And Movies Do You Like?
item.description: I’ve always liked to consume different types of content. Not only different medias and genres, but also different origins. Recently I have been watching some great non-English (and non-Asian) TV shows and movies. Because of that, I decided to start a series of posts sharing some great recommendations, most of those from Europe.

item.title: What I'm Watching [Oct. 4, 2020]
item.description: So, after a post on what I’m reading, let’s talk a bit about TV!

item.title: Watched: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel Season 3
item.description:
When I started this show, the first 2 season were out already. AND I BINGED BOTH SO QUICKLY. It became of of those series I absolutely love (almost) everything about: the actors, story, setting, music, costumes, comedy. I even bought the first 2 seasons' OSTs in vinyl.

For some reason though, I started season 3 when it was released, but didn’t get to finish it at that time. And then I went to Brazil, and was locked there for 5 months… But coming back home decided to finally watch the second half of the season, and I loved it!!

item.title: The King: Eternal Monarch - First Impressions
item.description: This weekend I started two new Korean dramas: The King: Eternal Monarch and Strangers From Hell. Let’s see my first impressions on the first show.

item.title: Watched This Week [Jun 5, 2020]
item.description: As I mentioned in the last post, my parents and I decided to watch more movies before starting a new series. Here are the movies I’ve watched with them, along with a couple series we watched.

item.title: Weekend Movies [Jun 4, 2020]
item.description: My parents and I decided to watch some movies, instead of starting a new TV show, so we can enjoy the last few days of Telecine’s free trial. Check below what we watched this weekend!
